item.title: Overloadx [putting an npc txt in npchandler.java]
item.dc:creator: @nolzan nolzan
item.description:
@nolzan wrote:

Hey guys need to add some npcs chats to overloadx i know its in npchandler.java file but the source doesnt have the

                    /* if(misc.random(50) == 1) {
                     npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                     npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                     npcs[i].textUpdate = "I had ya ma last night Nolzan";
                     }

Already built txt so if anyone can help it would be nice.
